venue.name: Cuvee - A Food, Wine and Champagne Room

item.description:
Hi Ladies-

FIRST WWNO this Friday 9/23 8pm at Cuvee in WeHa Center

We were toying with a Wingwomen Night out for the gals at one of the Tuesday Starbucks meetups. John was there and he seemed cool with the idea. Not that we don't love our Wingmen...but sometimes the gals just need to let loose with other gals.

So, if anyone is interested in doing this, I was thinking we should do our first WWNO (wingwomen night out) in West Hartford Center. Maybe start at 8pm with a little loungey Cuvee action so we get plenty of time to compliment each other on shoes and outfits...then move onto Barcelona or Elbow Room deck depending on the group's desire and the weather.

Of course, if the fellow wingmen just "happen" to show up for some of the festivities...we sure won't mind.
item.how_to_find_us: Organizer's cell phone # will be emailed out to YES rsvps day of or day before.
item.name: FRIDAY 9/23: First WWNO WingWomen Night out
